episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of intriguing topics, including the first recorded purchase of a pornographic book in England by Samuel Pepys, the theoretical physics of boiling a swimming pool with human activity, the Welsh tradition of determining garden size by axe throwing, and the unique social behaviors of caterpillars involving anal drumming.

facts.fact: The first person recorded ever buying a pornographic book in England was Samuel Pepys.
If 50 people swam continuously for 15 months in an Olympic-sized swimming pool, the water would boil.
In Wales, the size of your garden used to be determined by how far you could throw an axe.
Some caterpillars find new friends by drumming on their anuses.
